title: ITT: Imgs of the 2017 eclipse.
body:
I used my camera to take a picture of the sun and the reflected light made the eclipse look like a green crescent moon.
Also used paper pinhole.

My neighbors despite me warning them looked right into the sun.

Camera reflection:  http://i.imgur.com/2g51Tmr.png

Pinhole on paper: http://i.imgur.com/fn5gUbf.jpg


HOW BOUT YOU GUYS. I wanna see what is in a different state than NY.
